entry.title: The Bloom Knot
entry.summary:
Author: nocteris

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 26,258Chapters: 5/22Kudos: 49

Summary: “I suggest we ignore that it happened.” Your jaw physically dropped, “what?” “You got any soul marks on you?” You had already checked a million times, but you still removed your gloves to show him. Both ring fingers clean, you flexed them in his direction. “Same here,” he waved his already bare hands, clean as day. “So, we forget it ever happened unless some strange shit happens.” ——— Where you and Jason accidentally trigger the curse of soulmates— a curse that binds you to the first person you touch hands with. The plan was simple, to avoid each other. There was no way you—a STEM major, would cross paths with him anyway. So, what the hell were you doing in his Comparative Literature 121 lecture hall?

entry.title: we're all reaching out to find another hand
entry.summary:
Author: soter

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 44,852Chapters: 9/18Kudos: 133

Summary: “I know you’re a meta,” you blurt. Jason stares. “What.” “I saw your hand—I saw the cut and the blood, but then, it was healed, somehow, right, and like, I know I wasn’t supposed to see that and then I felt really bad about it and I wanted to let you know that I know but I didn’t want you to think I was going to, like, blackmail you—” “Blackmail me?” “Of course not,” you quickly say. “Never. No. That’s horrible. Can you imagine what would happen if it got out?” You wince. “Sorry, stupid question, you probably have.”or in which you discover that your neighbor, Jason Todd, is a metahuman, try to compensate, and things get a little... weird.

entry.title: you dream of some epiphany
entry.summary:
Author: BrickwallFairy

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,092Chapters: 2/7Kudos: 34

Summary: Then, through the voice modulator located in his helmet, the Red Hood goes: “How did you know? How the fuck did you know who I was?”“I – what? I - I didn’t.” It takes a second, just to process who he'd be, because you've spent so long telling yourself to stop holding out for a boy who'd never come back. “You - you’re not Jason, you can’t be.”Or:An AU where your soulmate's last words to you are written on your skin. You thought your life couldn’t get more interesting when you found out your best friend was Robin. You find out you were wrong when you discover your soulmate is Red Hood.

entry.title: Adjustments
entry.summary:
Author: gingerandcinnamon07

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,844Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 40

Summary: After a mission helping Constantine goes awry, you and Jason now have to navigate him being bitten by a werewolf (yes) and all the small, or large, adjustments that come with that. While Constantine works to find a reversal — after all, he got you all into this mess and portal-hopping-lycanthropes weren’t in the mission briefing — the two of you try to just take it all business as usual. Course that’s pretty difficult when there’s a whole family of bats getting in the way, Jason starts getting growly, and you’re fairly certain that this is all some weird fever dream. What could go wrong?

entry.title: How to Get a Ghoul-friend
entry.summary:
Author: Pipon

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,310Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 90

Summary: Jason is doing his thing, cleaning up Gotham's underworld one piece of shit at a time. After he takes out someone who'd been breaking his rules and evading him for years, something bad happens, and more things keep happening that he can't explain. Things he swears are all connected, somehow, and they all point... to her. He notices his family worrying, but they don't take his "findings" seriously. Admittedly theres no... concrete proof and the woman he claims to be communicating with has been missing for years, and if Jason wasn't experiencing all of this first hand he might not believe it either... Was he going crazy? He really hopes he's not going crazy... Again.---You are an unholy undead creature who has found herself haunting none other than the fearsome Red Hood, but only because you don't really have a choice in the matter. You do your best to look out for Jason's best interests from the shadows, but its hard when you're terrified of how he'd react to the mere sight of you. Probably best to stay hidden for now... What's the worst that could happen?(Really self indulgent, not to be taken too seriously, im playing fast and loose with canon events and magic and all that shit)
